heroSection.heading: Jordan Weather Dashboard
heroSection.description: Professional weather monitoring and forecasting for Bangladesh. Get real-time data, forecasts, and historical trends through our interactive dashboard.

trustedBySection.label: Trusted by
trustedBySection.title: Leading Institutions and Global Partners
trustedBySection.description: We're proud to collaborate with prestigious organizations to deliver reliable and innovative weather solutions across Bangladesh and beyond.

featuresSection.description: Precise weather analytics and forecasting tools for informed decision-making across Bangladesh.
featuresSection.temperatureDescription: Real-time and historical temperature data with interactive visualizations.
featuresSection.rainfallDescription: Rainfall analysis with regional comparisons and future predictions.
featuresSection.windDescription: Monitor wind speed and direction with safety alerts.
featuresSection.regionalDescription: Comparative weather analysis across Bangladesh regions.

howItWorks.subtitle: Advanced Weather Analytics Platform
howItWorks.description: Our advanced dashboard provides comprehensive insights into Bangladesh's weather with precision and clarity.
howItWorks.step1Description: Choose from 64 districts or any specific area in Bangladesh to access localized weather data.
howItWorks.step2Description: Explore real-time metrics, forecasts, and historical patterns through advanced visualizations.
howItWorks.step3Description: Leverage actionable insights for agriculture, disaster preparedness, and operational planning.

weatherAlertsSection.title: Weather Alerts
weatherAlertsSection.subtitle: Stay Ahead of Extreme Weather
weatherAlertsSection.description: Our advanced alert system keeps you informed about potential weather hazards across Bangladesh, helping communities stay safe and prepared.

cycloneWarnings.title: Cyclone Warnings
cycloneWarnings.description: Early detection and tracking of cyclones with detailed impact forecasts and evacuation guidance.

floodAlerts.title: Flood Alerts
floodAlerts.description: Predictive flood monitoring with river level tracking and precipitation analysis for vulnerable regions.

droughtMonitoring.title: Drought Monitoring
droughtMonitoring.description: Long-term precipitation analysis and soil moisture tracking to identify drought-prone areas.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by Professionals Across Bangladesh
testimonials.description: See what our users have to say about our weather dashboard.

reviews.quote1: The rainfall forecasting has been instrumental in helping farmers in our region plan their planting and harvesting schedules. The accuracy is impressive.
reviews.quote2: The early warning system for cyclones has been a game-changer for our coastal communities. We've been able to evacuate people well in advance of severe weather events.
reviews.quote3: The historical data analysis tools have been invaluable for our climate change research. We can now identify long-term trends with much greater precision.

ctaSection.heading: Unlock Smarter Weather Decisions
ctaSection.description: Access our real-time weather dashboard tailored for every district in Bangladesh. Stay ahead with forecasts, alerts, and insights that matter.

footerSection.description: Jordan Weather offers real-time, hyperlocal weather updates, visualizations, and forecasts to help you stay informed and prepared across all 64 districts of Bangladesh.

RadiosondeAnalyzer.title: Radiosonde Data Analyzer
RadiosondeAnalyzer.subtitle: Advanced meteorological data decoder for TTAA/TTBB upper air soundings with multi-format file support
RadiosondeAnalyzer.dropfiles: Drop files here or click to browse
RadiosondeAnalyzer.filesupport: Supports TX1, C5V, P10: free up to 100M each
RadiosondeAnalyzer.supportsfiles: Supports TXT, CSV, PDF files up to 10MB each
RadiosondeAnalyzer.maxwinddesc: Strongest wind observed in the atmospheric sounding
RadiosondeAnalyzer.significantdesc: Levels with significant temperature, humidity, and wind changes
RadiosondeAnalyzer.uploadttbb: Upload a file containing TTBB data or enter it manually
RadiosondeAnalyzer.looktropopause: Look for 88PmPmPm format in TTAA data
RadiosondeAnalyzer.lookmaxwind: Look for 77PmPmPm dddff format in TTAA data

noData.title: No Atmospheric Data Available
noData.description: Please analyze TTAA/TTBB radiosonde data first

header.title: Professional Tephigram Analysis
header.description: Advanced Atmospheric Sounding Analysis • Day {date} • {time}:00 UTC

isobars.title: Isobars - Constant Pressure Lines
isobars.description: Horizontal lines representing standard atmospheric pressure levels from 1000 hPa (surface) to 100 hPa (stratosphere). These lines form the foundation of upper-air analysis and help identify pressure systems and atmospheric layers.

isotherms.title: Isotherms - Constant Temperature Lines
isotherms.description: Vertical lines showing constant temperature values across all pressure levels. The 0°C isotherm is highlighted as it marks the freezing level, critical for aviation and precipitation type forecasting.

dryAdiabats.title: Dry Adiabats - Constant Potential Temperature
dryAdiabats.description: Curved lines showing how unsaturated air parcels change temperature as they rise or sink. These lines represent constant potential temperature (θ) and are essential for analyzing atmospheric stability and convective processes.

satAdiabats.title: Saturated Adiabats - Moist Air Parcels
satAdiabats.description: Curved lines showing temperature changes for saturated rising air parcels. These represent constant wet-bulb potential temperature (θw) and are crucial for analyzing precipitation processes and thunderstorm development.

hmrLines.title: Humidity Mixing Ratio Lines
hmrLines.description: Lines showing constant water vapor content (grams of water vapor per kilogram of dry air). These help determine moisture content at different levels and are essential for cloud formation analysis.

tempProfile.title: Environmental Lapse Rate - Temperature Profile
tempProfile.description: The actual temperature measurements from radiosonde data plotted against pressure levels. This profile shows the environmental lapse rate and is fundamental for stability analysis and weather forecasting.

dewpointProfile.title: Dew Point Profile - Moisture Content
dewpointProfile.description: Dew point temperature profile showing atmospheric moisture distribution with altitude. The gap between temperature and dew point profiles indicates relative humidity and potential for cloud formation.

windBarbs.title: Wind Barbs - Direction and Speed
windBarbs.description: Wind direction and speed at each pressure level displayed using standard meteorological wind barbs. Flags represent 50 knots, full barbs represent 10 knots, and half barbs represent 5 knots.

tropopause.title: Tropopause Layer - Atmospheric Boundary
tropopause.description: The boundary between the troposphere and stratosphere, identified from the 88PtPtPt group in the radiosonde data. This level marks where temperature stops decreasing with height and is crucial for aviation and climate studies.

maxWind.title: Maximum Wind Level
maxWind.description: The pressure level with the strongest wind speed in the sounding, identified from the 77PmPmPm group. This level is important for aviation planning and understanding jet stream characteristics.

complete.title: Complete Atmospheric Sounding Analysis
complete.description: Comprehensive view combining all meteorological elements: temperature and dew point profiles, pressure levels, wind data, tropopause boundary, and maximum wind level. This professional visualization enables detailed atmospheric stability analysis and weather forecasting.
